title: Firefox bookmarks
content: Helllllllllllp! Just had firefox install an update & now all my saved bookmarks, login passwords & previous home page have all gone. Have reset Home page, checked that Profile is correct & the bookmark folder is empty. Where have they all gone. Yes I have restarted my computer but made no difference.
creator: alarmms

title: Screen is cluttered with something on the left in my way
content:

title: fire fox browser
content: Lately, my Firefox browser does not play videos from Dailymail.co.uk. What seems to be the problem? It had been working so well before this until the last few months. I also have an ad block plus extension which I disabled for this site but nothing seems to work so far. I do not have a problem with Microsoft Edge playing videos from the dailymail. Any help?
creator: jdec91
